programme.title: Kin - EP 377
programme.desc: Nina finds out that Nathan is seeing Crystal. Syirah takes matters into her own hands when she feels that the investigation into her harassment case isn't making any headway. Emily is torn between her own needs and that of her family life as Ah Hock continues to pursue her.(n)

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37 - EP 7062
programme.desc: (Encore) This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.(n)

programme.title: RenovAID 8 - EP 5
programme.desc: For Mr Kamil and his family, a bed bug infestation has robbed them of their sleep and made their lives intolerable. Despite throwing out most of their furniture and investing in bed bug sprays, they cannot get rid of the pests. Can RenovAID help this family get a good night's rest?(n)

programme.title: All Over The Workplace S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!(n)

programme.title: Rusty Knight - EP 15
programme.desc: In Scrapland, the characters have all been put together from various recycled household utensils. They devote their unique talents to getting ex-cash register Knight Rusty out of trouble, who thinks he's the bravest, coolest knight in all of Scrapland (but he's really a show-off with a big mouth).(n)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 - EP 10
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of this enthusiastic, optimistic sponge whose good intentions inevitably lead him and his friends into trouble.(n)

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S8 - EP 5

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 22
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.(n)

programme.title: Totally Totto - EP 3
programme.desc: The hottest day of the year seems to be here - just in time for the school's Frisbee competition. Abby, who is Issac's best friend, wonders if there's a way to escape the heat… by making rain or rather, water bombs, just to skip the competition! At the same time, Totto takes Issac beyond the clouds to show him how rain is formed.(n)

Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?(n)

programme.desc: In this episode, famous dim sum chef, Chef Vannes will demonstrate how to make beautiful and delicious taro mushroom buns. Chinese physician Guo Mei Ling will tell you good habits that can improve itchy skin (pruritus). Rogue lawyer Josephus Tan and his mother will continue to share their journey in life with us. Enjoy classic songs from Tang Lan Hua, Stella Chang, and Wen Zhang. 本集节目,点心界的厨王Chef Vannes将示范如何用最简单的方法做出美观又可口的芋泥冬菇包。听郭美伶医师告诉你, 生活中哪些好习惯能帮助改善或预防皮肤瘙痒.一曲《光阴的故事》道出流氓律师陈俊良的青春岁月。还有汤兰花,张清芳,文章带来的多首经典传唱好歌必能让你大饱耳福。.(n)

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 370
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.(n)

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) A foreign worker who once helped Wei Ren fix his computer is moving house. Wei Ren and Ting Xuan offer to help him. While helping him, they start to develop some feelings for each other. As they come into physical contact, their hearts start beating quickly, and they suspect they have fallen for each other. Upon reaching home, they are unable to sleep well as the memories of them spending time with each other replay in their minds. (PG)(重)曾经帮为人修电脑的外籍劳工搬家，为人和庭萱来帮忙。过程中两人对彼此产生微妙的感觉，又因为有了肢体接触，内心不禁小鹿乱撞，怀疑自己爱上对方。回家后，两人都想起与对方相处的情景，辗转难眠。.(n)

(PG)谢颖下楼吃饭，遇到心事重重的贵强，手里拿着首饰盒子。她好奇打开盒子来看，见是她之前叫贵强买的手链。谢颖得知贵强被喜欢的女人拒绝，有些幸灾乐祸地取笑他，贵强突然大发脾气，丢下手链径直离去。.(n)

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 50
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.(n)

programme.title: 邻里合作社 United Neighbours Society - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) In each episode, we will zoom in on a residential estate where our two rival artistes will pit against each other to garner help from the residents to form their own "dream team". Each team will then embark on the task of decorating a 8 to 10 feet tall structure into an art piece within a given time. The winning art piece will then be decided by votes from MPs, arts professionals, as well as residents staying nearby. (重)(最后一集)两名主持人，各自找来一名〝达邻〞，帮忙在该区寻找10名组屋居民加入队伍。每队要在限时内以各种材料装饰一尊大型雕像。每集的雕像不一样，但都是一些可以代表新加坡的标志／物件，如狮子、椰树和胡姬花等。比赛结束后，该区居民、议员和美术专家们会进行投票，选出优胜队伍。节目宗旨：希望透过节目提倡睦邻精神、种族和谐及社区凝聚力，促进邻里彼此互动与了解。.(n)

Yan Xun does not understand why Xi Yue is so stubborn, and the two of them argue. In a fit of anger, Xi Yue runs downstairs and flings the bracelet away. After the incident, she regrets doing so and wants to find the bracelet back, but her search for it is in vain. (PG)(重)彦勋送新手链给喜悦，喜悦没有欢欣之情，始终觉得旧手链对她意义更重大，不是一条新手链可以取代的。彦勋不解为何喜悦如此固执，两人发生口角。喜悦一气之下，跑到楼下把旧手链丢掉，事后她感到后悔，想要找回，却遍寻不获。.(n)

(重)国堂罪名成立，入狱服刑，水仙则将无罪释放。立海嫖妓，被母亲发现，牛奶王大怒，决定把即将释放的水仙给接回来住，以免宝贝儿子为了满足欲望而泥足深陷，再次染上性病。头家娘心里实在瞧不起水仙这个媳妇，但也只能无奈接受。.(n)

programme.title: 心。愿 The Wish - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) A motorbike accident robbed aircraft engineer Tan Hong Lian of his mobility, but not his spirit. Now in a nursing home, he finds solace in gardening and grooming its plants. His wish is to do more for the residents and share his love and handiwork with them. Can The Wish team grow his green passion into a greater oasis? (重)一场摩托车事故夺走了飞机工程师陈鸿亮的一只手中的工能，使他不能工作；但这却没有夺走他的干劲。 他现在在养老院里，并在园艺和修饰植物方面找到了慰藉。 他的愿望是为居民做更多的事，并与他们分享他的爱心和手工。”聚爱圆梦”团队能否将他的绿色激情变成更大的绿洲？.(n)

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Mark Lee visits "Superstar" couple Junyang and Candyce's family. Enjoy classic songs from Tang Lan Hua, Stella Chang, and Wen Zhang. 本集节目,点心界的厨王Chef Vannes将示范如何用最简单的方法做出美观又可口的芋泥冬菇包。听郭美伶医师告诉你, 生活中哪些好习惯能帮助改善或预防皮肤瘙痒.一曲《光阴的故事》道出流氓律师陈俊良的青春岁月。还有汤兰花,张清芳,文章带来的多首经典传唱好歌必能让你大饱耳福。.(n)

Mandy是个养尊处优的富太太，生活重心便是游走于上流社会的富太太之间，彼此炫富。不料律师丈夫谢志鸿破产，变卖物业后准备和小三远走高飞。Mandy追到机场与志鸿理论，动之以情，想让他回心转意，志鸿却突然倒地不起！.(n)

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 111
programme.desc: En Jia pleads with Shan Shan to support Ah Niang's dream of becoming a fashion designer. Shan Shan says that Ah Niang is the one who gave up on the dream, leading En Jia to suggest that Ah Niang only did so to not worry others. En Jia strongly believes that Ah Niang will be able to succeed, and hopes that Shan Shan can convince Ah Niang to meet her boss. 思嘉请求姗姗支持阿娘追求当服装设计师的梦想，姗姗说决定放弃的是阿娘，但思嘉却一语道破，指阿娘可能只是为了让身边的人安心，才无奈地放弃。思嘉坚信阿娘可以实现梦想，希望姗姗说服阿娘和她老板见一面。.(n)

programme.desc: This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.(n)

programme.title: 乐学每疫刻 Learn Together With Me - EP 6
programme.desc: Hosted by Dennis Chew, Learn Together With Me teaches you the right way to wear a mask, simple apps you can use to connect with your friends, and how to do a TikTok dance. 这一集的《乐学每疫刻》将教您正确佩戴口罩的方法，还有一些能与朋友保持联系的简单应用程序，以及如何跳 好玩的TikTok 舞蹈。.(n)

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 14
programme.desc: Qingchen successfully entered Sky Dance Brothel in a disguise. Qingchen said to Pingting that the Sacred Sorceress clan has been destroyed and only Dark Sorceress can rebuild the Sacred Sorceress clan. Pingting hired Qingchen and she settled in the Brothel. 卿尘乔装打扮来到了天舞醉坊寻找坊主，武聘婷。卿尘淡定地吹捧了一番碧血阁和暗巫的强大，她指出只有暗巫一脉才能光复巫族。武聘婷让她化名文清，入驻天舞醉坊为自己效力。.(n)

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 374
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.(n)

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 17
programme.desc: Yu Jie manages to find Uncle Chan's old lover, and he brings Xi Yue and Uncle Chan to the Palliative Care Centre to find her. However, they realise that they are too late as she has recently passed away, and sadly there is no fate for Uncle Chan to meet her again. Uncle Chan is disappointed, and Yu Jie comforts Xi Yue as she starts crying inconsolably. Yu Jie pities her, and this ignites in his strong feelings for her. He confesses to Xi Yue. Xi Yue does not dare to accept his feelings. 宇捷找到Uncle Chan的旧情人，带着喜悦和Uncle Chan到临终关怀中心，不料迟了一步，对方已逝世，两人缘悭一面。Uncle Chan感失落，喜悦更是无法控制，哭倒在宇捷怀里。宇捷怜惜不已，激起对喜悦浓烈的情感，终于忍不住向她表白。喜悦不敢接受，惊慌逃离。.(n)

programme.desc: "Garden Of Treasure " is a documentary on the healing functions and botanical characteristics of wild flowers and herbs which can also be used to cook simple and delicious flower dishes. 《寻花探草》是以药草拍摄为主的纪录片，介绍他们心目中的百搭花草，逐一分享花草的药疗功能和植物特性, 也化成一道道简单好味的花草料理。.(n)

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: Weixin unconsciously signed the land transfer agreement that Nana gave him. Tianjiu threatens Nana that he will harm Weixin if she does not comply with his demand. Weixin is heartbroken when Nana deceives and leaves him. 威信不知情下签了娜娜给他的地皮转让书。天鹫威胁娜娜如果她不听从,将会伤害威信。威信心痛娜娜对他的欺骗与离别。.(n)

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 54
programme.desc: Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.(n)

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 2 Say It! Sr 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: In this episode, En Lai and Gurmit Singh will be doing volunteer work! They will collect donated vegetables at the market, help to prepare and distribute meals to the needy elderly, chat with them, as well as bring the elderly for free medical checkups! 这一集的《好好说 慢慢讲》十分有意义！因为恩来和葛米星将要当义工，随真正的义工团体一起做善事！他们会如何用华语完成这些任务？在好好说、慢慢讲的过程中又如何既散播爱心，又不失笑料？.(n)

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 112
programme.desc: Ke Ai manages to land herself the lead role of a drama. However, after the video of Boris and Shun Shui's fight in the park was posted on the internet, Ke Ai's manager decides to give the role to someone else. A new girl from Malacca applies for the job as a kitchen assistant. (重)19世纪初日本劳工的涌入，促使菲律宾达沃的麻蕉出口蓬勃发展，并成功蜕变成菲律宾最早现代化的城市之一。而菲律宾也是东南亚住有最多日本人的国家。多年以来，许多生活在菲律宾的日本后裔总是面对一种矛盾，他们是日本人，而菲律宾却是他们成长的地方，他们该如何自处？何去何从？上一代日本后裔背负着战争的枷锁，饱受主流社会的仇视，而新一代的日本后裔虽然没有了战争的包袱，却仍然必须在破碎的家庭中成长。这一集节目探讨生活在菲律宾的日本后裔的故事。.(n)

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 12

Beijing is home to many migrant worker families and for some, affordable child care means relying on willing and tired grandparents. And for some of the elderly migrant workers, after enduring many years of loneliness and hardship to support their family, they're faced with imminent retrenchment. (重)90后大学毕业生受不了电商工作加班无休，毅然裸辞去追梦。北漂夫妻在北京养育幼儿， 昂贵的生活负担迫使双方家长倾力协助。在北京15年孤苦的日子，年近七旬的清洁工，只望儿子顺利大学毕业。看北漂人为成就北京梦而奔走。.(n)

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places of ultimate experience and showcase places of interest and culture. Countries covered are Russia, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, etc. In this episode, the host will bring viewers to tour Moscow. (重)这系列的旅游节目将带观众到异国风情的地方，享受终极的体验，参观名胜古迹。覆盖的国家是俄罗斯，乌兹别克斯坦，哈萨克斯坦等。在这一集，主持人将带观众游览莫斯科。.(n)

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 49
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Zhengji and Juxi want Yalan to leave home immediately when they discover that Yalan has mistreated Wu Chun numerous times. Juxi agrees to give Yalan another chance, but Yalan is so afraid of being abandoned by her parents that she suddenly cannot speak. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)正基和菊熙发现雅兰做出许多对不起吴春的事，要她立刻离开，而且休想可以轻易回家。随后，菊熙重新接受雅兰，但雅兰非常担心被父母抛弃，突然得了失语症。.(n)

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 50
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Juxi wants Wu Chun to represent her team to make a presentation to the rest of the company. The jealous Yalan switches Wu Chun's thumb drive on purpose, causing irrelevant slides to be displayed during the presentation. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)菊熙点名要吴春向公司内部的同事们发表企划案。雅兰眼红，故意调换吴春的随身碟，导致吴春在发表会上放映非相关画面，令菊熙觉得很难堪。.(n)

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 21
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Reflecting on her frequent headaches recently, Qiangxiu quietly goes for taking MRI and CT scans. After consulting Zhihong, it is confirmed she is suffering from Meningioma which can lead to seizures. Mingxun tries to fire Huijing for dereliction of duty when taking care of congressman Luo. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)强秀回忆起自己近期的频繁头痛，偷偷去照电脑断层跟核磁共振照片，并询问了智弘的意见，确认自己患了脑膜瘤以导致失神发作。明勋要慧静出席临时惩戒纪律委员会会议，想藉她照顾罗议员失职而导致他差点死亡之事开除她。.(n)

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 22
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) With Zhihong and other committee members coming to her defence in the disciplinary hearing, Huijing is let off with a month's suspension. At the same time, she manages to obtain Jiang Moshun's anesthesia report. Both Yundao and Zhihong offer to operate on Qiangxiu. Qiangxiu chooses Zhihong eventually. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智弘和泰豪等委员在惩戒纪律会议中为慧静力争辩护下，慧静被罚停职一个月。同时，智弘又与金致贤医生达成交易取得姜末顺的麻醉报告。允道和智弘都想给强秀做手术，强秀最后选择了智弘。.(n)

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 12
programme.desc: "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. "中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.(n)

What is Nga Pi - the flavour of Burmese dishes? Discover with Darren Lim, Myanmese pride in iconic dishes such as Burmese curries and Mohinga. (重)军阀统治解放后的缅甸，所呈现的是一个什么样的饮食天地？缅甸的沙拉为何种类丰富、多达上百种？促成缅甸家乡风味的酱料是什么呢？跟随林明伦到解放后的缅甸，享受淳朴的鱼汤米粉和鱼酱料理，解放对缅甸的种种误解！.(n)

programme.desc: (R) It is everyone's right to pursue happiness! In modern days, should women refrain from being reserved so they can be nearer to happiness? In this episode, the guests will talk about the contraindications for pursuing happiness. Happiness is near yet far, how can the women grasp it at the right time? (重)追求自己的幸福是每个人的权利！现今社会的女人是否应该摒弃“矜持”两个字才能更靠近幸福一点？节目中将探讨女人追求幸福时的禁忌，男人与女人相亲时该注意的事项；幸福那么近却又那么远，女人要怎么把握呢？.(n)

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 25

She would rather Taizhen make Daojing bankrupt, than see Daojing get hurt. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道京破坏他的婚礼,泰振决定向道京报复，更出手殴打他。海英苦苦求情，恳求泰振放过道京，并说宁愿泰振让道京破产，也不要道京受伤。Ep.(n)

Bai Zhe kills Duying when Duying recognizes him to be the man speaking to Shina at a park previously. (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/韩)世娜为了从正韩手上夺回记忆卡，派白哲去绑架佳英，然后要白哲让度英去向正韩拿记忆卡。度英认出白哲是之前在公园跟世娜见面的人，结果被白哲刺死。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 50

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.(n)

programme.title: 边缘青年 Forgotten Youths - EP 5
programme.desc: China has the highest percentage of overweight in the world! 4 million obese children out of population of 14 billion population. These patients use different methods to lose weight, some even life endangering. How would they survive the life of dieting with pain and danger? Would they succeed? 中国已经成为世界上最多肥胖人口的国家！14亿的人口中将近一亿的肥胖成年人口和四千万的肥胖儿童！肥胖病人用各种方式来减肥、减重，有的方式有效，有的方式会危及生命。他们如何度过减肥减重的日子？会经历什么样的痛苦和危险？他们能够成功吗？.(n)

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 33

Youjing stops the reporter from doing so by telling her about how Yingshu seduced Wancai years ago. Wancai dies from agitation when he finds out about what Youjing has done. Ep 33: 杂志社记者要调查泰俊和世珍的丑闻。幼京为了阻止记者，以英淑当年勾引万才的故事做交换。报道令英淑很伤心。万才查到是幼京爆料的，激动过度，逝世。.(n)

programme.desc: Osteroy Prison is located on a lush, 9 hectares island of pine trees and rocky coasts, with views of the ocean that are postcard-worthy. It feels more like a resort than jail. Will it really serve its purpose to turn high profile convicts into responsible and functioning members of society? 奥斯泰哈监狱位于挪威西南部，是一座小岛监狱。这里没有高墙、没有围栏，更没有持枪的警卫。这一集的《非常监狱》将探索挪威如何以人性化的制度使囚犯们寻回良知、重新投入社会。.(n)

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 34

Ep 34: 律师在万才去世后的49天公开他的遗嘱。遗嘱写到，辉京若能拯救AP食品，就由辉京担任白道的会长，但在那之前由敬莞暂时担任会长。另外，万才的所有房产所有权归幼京。幼京见房产落入她手里，公司又由敬莞接管，开心不已。.(n)

Taizhen hits the brakes at the last moment, and his car stops just inches from Daojing. Ep 28 Tx 24-8-2019On the marriage proposal day, Daojing sees the vision of his own death while standing at the entrance of the venue. Suddenly, a vehicle being pursued by a police car hits Ep 27 Tx 24/8/2019泰振在车里怒视着刚从办公室离开的道京。泰振踩上油门，开车冲向道京。正当车子就快撞上道京时，泰振及时刹车，车子差一点就撞上道京。Ep 28 Tx 24/8/2019在求婚当天，道京在场地门口等海英时，看到自己在车祸中将死去的一幕。突然，一辆被警车追逐的车把道京给撞飞。道京虽然还是遭遇了车祸，但在海英和所有家人朋友的陪伴下度过难关。两人最终也得到众人的祝福，顺利地完成婚礼。.(n)

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 7
programme.desc: Former North Koreans have through the years fled to China to escape war and famine back home. This week, we explore their community in the fringes of Jilin. We'll also look at the plight of North Koreans who seek better lives in South Korea, but face tensions from locals there. 这一集节目将会到吉林省的延边地区，了解朝鲜族人到底过着怎么样的生活？他们的祖先为了逃避战火与饥荒来到了中国，现在虽拥有中国国籍，在生活习惯上仍保持着传统的朝鲜族文化。他们吃泡菜、说朝鲜话、念朝鲜族学校，他们的文化如何在异乡落地生根，茁壮成长呢？韩国崛起，和他们有着相同文化和语言的朝鲜族人都蜂拥到那里工作。但韩国人对这个远道而来的同胞并不太友善，针对他们的歧视与差别待遇更是屡见不鲜。年迈的父母与年幼的孩子是在韩工作的朝鲜族人最大的牵挂。.(n)

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 7
programme.desc: In the martial arts world of renowned novelist Jin Yong, not only are martial arts heroes awe-inspiring, but flavourful dishes also come to life. Host Michelle Chia visits Hong Kong to experience the taste of the unique cuisine favoured by our legendary heroes and their famous author. 在金庸笔下的武侠世界里，除了有武功高强的英雄人物、还有让人食指大动的美食。书中菜肴的描述，在字里行间让人垂涎，也激发厨师的创意。 这一集，主持人谢韵仪走访香港，品尝提供视觉与味觉双重享受的江湖美食。.(n)

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 35
programme.desc: Ep 35: Huijing is determined to buck up and fight for Wancai's assets when he finds out that Youjing is the main factor behind Wancai's death. Youjing does not think Huijing will succeed and jeers at him. Ep 35: 辉京发现幼京为了私心而间接导致万才去世后，决定振作起来，拯救AP食品，夺回公司和万才的财产。幼京知道后，对辉京百般嘲讽。.(n)

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 18
programme.desc: Ep 27 Tx 24-8-2019Taizhen glares angrily at Daojing, who just stepped out of his office. After some hesitation, Taizhen steps on the accelerator of his car and speeds towards Daojing who runs desperately for his life. Taizhen hits the brakes at the last moment, and his car stops just inches from Daojing. Ep 28 Tx 24-8-2019On the marriage proposal day, Daojing sees the vision of his own death while standing at the entrance of the venue. Suddenly, a vehicle being pursued by a police car hits Ep 27 Tx 24/8/2019泰振在车里怒视着刚从办公室离开的道京。泰振踩上油门，开车冲向道京。正当车子就快撞上道京时，泰振及时刹车，车子差一点就撞上道京。Ep 28 Tx 24/8/2019在求婚当天，道京在场地门口等海英时，看到自己在车祸中将死去的一幕。突然，一辆被警车追逐的车把道京给撞飞。道京虽然还是遭遇了车祸，但在海英和所有家人朋友的陪伴下度过难关。两人最终也得到众人的祝福，顺利地完成婚礼。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 61
programme.desc: Ep 55: Shina instigates Jiezi Cosmetics' franchisees and staff to think that Jiezi Cosmetics will be forced out business if it does not merge with YB Cosmetics. The franchisees and staff want Jiaying to leave the company as she opposes to the merger. 世娜煽动洁姿美妆代理店的店长们，指佳英不赞成洁姿美妆跟YB化妆品进行企业合并就会导致洁姿美妆走向倒闭。代理店的店长们和公司职员都觉得佳英在影响公司的发展，要佳英离开公司。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 63
programme.desc: Ep 56: Yinxiu overhears the conversation between the eatery staff and finds out that his father's name is "Yin Zhenghan". Yinxiu asks Zaidong to bring him to the office to meet his father when he realises that Zaidong is working with his father. 尹秀听到饭馆员工们的对话，知道父亲的名字是“尹正韩”，而且父亲跟载东在同一间公司上班，于是要求载东带他到公司找爸爸。.(n)

programme.title: 进击的台湾 Hello Taiwan - EP 3
programme.desc: This programme introduces to viewers Taiwan's local cuisine and the story behind their success. 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.(n)

programme.title: 再创世纪 Another Era - EP 1
programme.desc: The story of Another Era begins with the global financial crisis of 2008. Ambitious businessman Leo Ho Ting Sang (Roger Kwok) wanted to buy out Fong Chung Yam's (Bowie Wu) business group, but Cheuk Kai Tong (Pat Poon) stopped him in time. Furious, Leo decides to out a plan to destroy him. 2008年金融海啸席卷全球，野心商人贺天生（郭晋安饰）欲趁机吞并香港首富方松荫（胡枫饰）的集团，最后却遭富商卓启堂（潘志文饰）出手阻挠，天生怀恨在心，伺机复仇。2016年，启堂已取代松荫成为香港首富，但却遭天降横祸，他因两名儿子意外离世大受打击，心脏病发昏迷。不谙世事的幼女卓定垚（周励淇饰）为守家业，在私募基金代理人高哲扶助下，与天生展开连场商战。随着启堂苏醒，天生妻子章明晞（杨怡饰）、松荫的孙子方泽雨（袁伟豪饰）、创业青年程凯（周柏豪饰）纷纷加入战局.(n)

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 21
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.(n)

programme.title: SAGA S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: SAGA S2 picks up the story of the two antagonists from the first installation, Zack and Ryan. The action-packed story is laces with vengeful dark secrets, betrayals and revenge. Zack, a strong-willled ex-convict who is determined to mend his past, goes head-on against his Silat Master father, Borhan. Behind Borhan's back, Zack seeks refuge in Borhan's nemesis, Ryan, who encourages him to explore his deep interest in Mix Martial Arts. Zack finds out he is merely a pawn in Ryan’s mission to pay off his debt to Rio. Sofea witnesses an unconscious Borhan being handled by Farouk and informs Zack. Alarmed, they seek Farouk out but had no proof of him being connected to Borhan’s disappearance. Zack is seriously injured while defending himself and Sofea from an ambush attack by a group of hooligans. Ryan is pleased and confident the injury will cause Zack to lose an important MMA match, which he had placed a huge bet on the contender.(n)

programme.title: Kembara Kasih - EP 3
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Dalina makes her way to Phnom Penh, where the villagers live simply in ramshackle houses without water or electricity. Together with fellow volunteer, Fazli, she soon discovers that simple innovations and recycling methods can improve their living conditions bit by bit. She collects unused and half-used soap bars from hotel customers, and brings it over to an organisation that recycle them into new soap bars for the villagers. She also discovers how a simple pet bottle, water and a bit of bleach put through the zinc roofs of the houses can shine as brightly as any electrical bulb. Finally she joins some school children, whom she is impressed by how fast they pick up singing and dancing, and even paint a new mural for their school.(n)

programme.title: Di Hujung Pelangi - EP 8
programme.desc: Host: Norfasarie'Di Hujung Pelangi' takes a look at the inspirational journeys of these special families who have learn to accept and embrace life's challenges by moving their lives forward in the most positive direction. Attention-Deficit-Hyperactivity Disorder (AD-HD) is a condition that can make it hard for a person to sit still, control behavior, and pay attention. These difficulties usually begin before the person is 7 years old. However, these behaviors may not be noticed until the child is older.There are three main signs, or symptoms, of AD-HD. They are- problems with paying attention, being very active (called hyperactivity), and acting before thinking (called impulsivity). In this episode we will feature a family with a child who has ADHD. The child was diagnosed with ADHD when he was at school-going age. Family share how he was diagnosed, the challenges before and after the diagnosis and how they have come up with ways to help him cope with school and at home.(n)

He instigated Tasriq to hate Sofiya. Then one day, Umi Khatijah is shocked when she heard Sofiya missing while swimming in the river. Kifli found Sofiya while fishing and brought her home. He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Kamil and Kiah pretended to treat Sofiya with love and affections. Kamil suggested Khadijah match match Riena with Tashriq. Kamil further tested Khadijah’s trust with him by digging the past. Both Kamil and Tashriq caused her in dilemma. Tashriq goes alone to Zainab’s house to ask about Alysa and Sofiya. He comes back home and agrees to marry Riena much to Khadijah’s surprised.(n)

programme.title: J.K.K S3 - EP 11

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 1
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her. All his life, Luqman has always dreamed of becoming a pilot. But when he fails his exam, his plan was halted. He then decides to alter his result slip to make everyone believe that he passed. Proud of his son's achievement, Luqman's mother willingly agrees to propose Zia, the most sought after girl in the village, for him.(n)

programme.title: Solo - EP 7

programme.title: Mek Gyver - EP 8

Her good friend Aizul runs a repair service and persuades her to work with him. Zara agrees to Aizul's request to earn extra pocket money and to earn money to save a surau. programme.title: Percaya Lagi - EP 6
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Nora and her husband are from a low-income family. Although both have full time jobs, they struggle financially to bring up their 3 young children. When they receive keys to their new flat, the couple makes the mistake of taking up a renovation loan, which amounts to $16,000. On top of that, Nora is knee-high in debt as she is not able to manage her spending. Eventually, Nora could no longer keep up with monthly payments and daily expenses. After exhausting all avenues of borrowing money from friends and her sister, Nora turns to illegal moneylenders. When she starts receiving calls from moneylenders demanding payments, Nora becomes depressed and tries to commit suicide. How did Nora get out of this messy situation?(n)

Then Atul and Fitri came back but Atan does not like Fitri because he spend his time with gadgets and speaks English. Can Mak Cun penetrates China's market and can Atin outdo Feng Yin as the top student? Ramu’s mother come to Mak Cun’s house to inform her that Ramu has run away. Bob meets Ramu who is hiding in the hut. They talk and he tells Ramu about his strict father who forbids him and his siblings from playing outside. Ramu is scared to get circumcised. Kamsiah try to mend her behavior. Kamsiah shares her problem with Pak Karim as why she is living away from society.(n)

And what is the best type of food to consume in order to avoid high blood pressure and high cholesterol.(n)

programme.title: Dia Yang Ku Cinta - EP 1
programme.desc: Cempaka and her brother Iman are stepchildren of Tuan Khalid and Marhanna. However Marhanna and her daughter Lara Andrew hated the two siblings and often abused them. They pretended to be kind in the presence of Tuan Khalid and Hafiz Andrew. Both Hafiz and Lara are also stepchildren of Tuan Khalid. They are the children of Marhanna and her ex-husband, an English man. Cempaka decided to leave the house but her love for Hafiz prevented her from leaving the house. What will happen to them? Zack finds out he is merely a pawn in Ryan’s mission to pay off his debt to Rio. Sofea witnesses an unconscious Borhan being handled by Farouk and informs Zack. Alarmed, they seek Farouk out but had no proof of him being connected to Borhan’s disappearance. Zack is seriously injured while defending himself and Sofea from an ambush attack by a group of hooligans. Ryan is pleased and confident the injury will cause Zack to lose an important MMA match, which he had placed a huge bet on the contender.(n)

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 25
programme.desc: Zalia has something up her sleeves when she chances upon Ain and Salehin together in a shopping mall. She uses this opportunity in an attempt to break Aidil and Ain's marriage. Adil reacts and becomes aggressive towards Ain.(n)

programme.title: Sayang Achu Ketat Ketat
programme.desc: Career minded Auliyah and Zaqri have been married for five years and were still childless. Her work load meant that work was her top priority rather than having a child. When she received an offer to work in Australia, Auliyah wants Zaqri to quit his job and travel with her to fulfill her dream. Zaqri refused to leave his job and wants her to forgo her dream. While the situation rremain tense, they were entrusted to care for his late sister's two kids.(n)

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 11
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible. Dhia's dreams were shattered when her father died of a heart attack.While Dhia is in the midst of mourning, Emillia insists on getting Zikri to divorce Dhia.When her plan seemed to fall apart, she threatened to commit suicide if Zikri still refused to leave Dhia.(n)

programme.title: 奔奔小飛車 Egg Car
programme.desc: Meet Dash, an imperfect egg-shaped car and his friends – the mysterious Aera, the hedgehog Click, and the giraffe Girara! Together, they must rescue their village and families. 一同來和奔奔，一輛不完美的蛋形車和他的朋友 - 神秘的小愛，刺猬點點和長頸鹿高拉拉做朋友！ 四個年輕的小伙子必須一起從龍霸天，一個強大的反派和他的同黨手中拯救他們的村莊和家人！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S3
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S1
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 乐比悠悠 Rubi - The Arrival of Little Bro
programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 昆塔.叽里咕嚕奶泡泡 Secret Y2
programme.desc: Join our curious friends as they continue to introduce scientific knowledge to children by explaining things in a humorous way in this new season! Got a question? Gaga will answer! 歡迎加入我們好奇寶寶的一群！在新的一季，我們繼續通過有趣的方式介紹科學知識，GaGa和朋友會為你一一解答您的惑問！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 小小画家熊小米 A Little Artist Remy Bear
programme.desc: Remy Bear, an enthusiastic and clever bear, faces different problems in his life. With a magic brush, Remy Bear can bring the friends in his drawings alive and they solve problems. 主人公熊小米和他的朋友主人公們的成長過程中總是遇到層出不窮、千奇百怪的問題和困難，他們在神奇畫筆的幫助下，通過極富想象力和創造力的涂鴉繪畫，迎難而上，集思廣益，用充滿美與愛的方式讓問題和困難迎刃而解。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S4
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces different kinds of dinosaurs as they explore their world with their friends! "幫幫龍出動"通過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 笨狼和他的小伙伴 Silly Wolf and His Buddies
programme.desc: In a distant and beautiful forest town, the animals live in harmony. However, amongst them, Silly Wolf is accident prone and gets into a lot of trouble despite good intentions... 在一個遙遠而美麗的森林小鎮，動物們和諧地生活。 但是，其中有小笨狼容易出事，儘管他的意圖是好的，但仍會造成很多麻煩，有時甚至會對他人造成傷害。 幸運的是，在朋友的幫助和陪伴下，小笨狼得以學習和成長，最終對他周圍的人產生了積極的影響。.(n)

programme.title: 奔奔小飛車 Egg Car
programme.desc: Meet Dash, an imperfect egg-shaped car and his friends – the mysterious Aera, the hedgehog Click, and the giraffe Girara! Together, they must rescue their village and families. 一同來和奔奔，一輛不完美的蛋形車和他的朋友 - 神秘的小愛，刺猬點點和長頸鹿高拉拉做朋友！ 四個年輕的小伙子必須一起從龍霸天，一個強大的反派和他的同黨手中拯救他們的村莊和家人！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S3
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S1
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 乐比悠悠 Rubi - The Arrival of Little Bro
programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 昆塔.叽里咕嚕奶泡泡 Secret Y2
programme.desc: Join our curious friends as they continue to introduce scientific knowledge to children by explaining things in a humorous way in this new season! Got a question? Gaga will answer! 歡迎加入我們好奇寶寶的一群！在新的一季，我們繼續通過有趣的方式介紹科學知識，GaGa和朋友會為你一一解答您的惑問！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 昆塔.叽里咕嚕奶泡泡 Secret Y2
programme.desc: Join our curious friends as they continue to introduce scientific knowledge to children by explaining things in a humorous way in this new season! Got a question? Gaga will answer! 歡迎加入我們好奇寶寶的一群！在新的一季，我們繼續通過有趣的方式介紹科學知識，GaGa和朋友會為你一一解答您的惑問！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 小小画家熊小米 A Little Artist Remy Bear
programme.desc: Remy Bear, an enthusiastic and clever bear, faces different problems in his life. With a magic brush, Remy Bear can bring the friends in his drawings alive and they solve problems. 主人公熊小米和他的朋友主人公們的成長過程中總是遇到層出不窮、千奇百怪的問題和困難，他們在神奇畫筆的幫助下，通過極富想象力和創造力的涂鴉繪畫，迎難而上，集思廣益，用充滿美與愛的方式讓問題和困難迎刃而解。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S4
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces different kinds of dinosaurs as they explore their world with their friends! "幫幫龍出動"通過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 笨狼和他的小伙伴 Silly Wolf and His Buddies
programme.desc: In a distant and beautiful forest town, the animals live in harmony. However, amongst them, Silly Wolf is accident prone and gets into a lot of trouble despite good intentions... 在一個遙遠而美麗的森林小鎮，動物們和諧地生活。 但是，其中有小笨狼容易出事，儘管他的意圖是好的，但仍會造成很多麻煩，有時甚至會對他人造成傷害。 幸運的是，在朋友的幫助和陪伴下，小笨狼得以學習和成長，最終對他周圍的人產生了積極的影響。.(n)

programme.title: 奔奔小飛車 Egg Car
programme.desc: Meet Dash, an imperfect egg-shaped car and his friends – the mysterious Aera, the hedgehog Click, and the giraffe Girara! Together, they must rescue their village and families. 一同來和奔奔，一輛不完美的蛋形車和他的朋友 - 神秘的小愛，刺猬點點和長頸鹿高拉拉做朋友！ 四個年輕的小伙子必須一起從龍霸天，一個強大的反派和他的同黨手中拯救他們的村莊和家人！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S3
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S1
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 乐比悠悠 Rubi - The Arrival of Little Bro
programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 昆塔.叽里咕嚕奶泡泡 Secret Y2
programme.desc: Join our curious friends as they continue to introduce scientific knowledge to children by explaining things in a humorous way in this new season! Got a question? Gaga will answer! 歡迎加入我們好奇寶寶的一群！在新的一季，我們繼續通過有趣的方式介紹科學知識，GaGa和朋友會為你一一解答您的惑問！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 小小画家熊小米 A Little Artist Remy Bear
programme.desc: Remy Bear, an enthusiastic and clever bear, faces different problems in his life. With a magic brush, Remy Bear can bring the friends in his drawings alive and they solve problems. 主人公熊小米和他的朋友主人公們的成長過程中總是遇到層出不窮、千奇百怪的問題和困難，他們在神奇畫筆的幫助下，通過極富想象力和創造力的涂鴉繪畫，迎難而上，集思廣益，用充滿美與愛的方式讓問題和困難迎刃而解。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S4
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces different kinds of dinosaurs as they explore their world with their friends! "幫幫龍出動"通過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 笨狼和他的小伙伴 Silly Wolf and His Buddies
programme.desc: In a distant and beautiful forest town, the animals live in harmony. However, amongst them, Silly Wolf is accident prone and gets into a lot of trouble despite good intentions... 在一個遙遠而美麗的森林小鎮，動物們和諧地生活。 但是，其中有小笨狼容易出事，儘管他的意圖是好的，但仍會造成很多麻煩，有時甚至會對他人造成傷害。 幸運的是，在朋友的幫助和陪伴下，小笨狼得以學習和成長，最終對他周圍的人產生了積極的影響。.(n)

programme.title: 奔奔小飛車 Egg Car
programme.desc: Meet Dash, an imperfect egg-shaped car and his friends – the mysterious Aera, the hedgehog Click, and the giraffe Girara! Together, they must rescue their village and families. 一同來和奔奔，一輛不完美的蛋形車和他的朋友 - 神秘的小愛，刺猬點點和長頸鹿高拉拉做朋友！ 四個年輕的小伙子必須一起從龍霸天，一個強大的反派和他的同黨手中拯救他們的村莊和家人！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S3
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.desc: Meet Dash, an imperfect egg-shaped car and his friends – the mysterious Aera, the hedgehog Click, and the giraffe Girara! Together, they must rescue their village and families. 一同來和奔奔，一輛不完美的蛋形車和他的朋友 - 神秘的小愛，刺猬點點和長頸鹿高拉拉做朋友！ 四個年輕的小伙子必須一起從龍霸天，一個強大的反派和他的同黨手中拯救他們的村莊和家人！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S3
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S1
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 乐比悠悠 Rubi - The Arrival of Little Bro
programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 昆塔.叽里咕嚕奶泡泡 Secret Y2
programme.desc: Join our curious friends as they continue to introduce scientific knowledge to children by explaining things in a humorous way in this new season! Got a question? Gaga will answer! 歡迎加入我們好奇寶寶的一群！在新的一季，我們繼續通過有趣的方式介紹科學知識，GaGa和朋友會為你一一解答您的惑問！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 小小画家熊小米 A Little Artist Remy Bear
programme.desc: Remy Bear, an enthusiastic and clever bear, faces different problems in his life. With a magic brush, Remy Bear can bring the friends in his drawings alive and they solve problems. 主人公熊小米和他的朋友主人公們的成長過程中總是遇到層出不窮、千奇百怪的問題和困難，他們在神奇畫筆的幫助下，通過極富想象力和創造力的涂鴉繪畫，迎難而上，集思廣益，用充滿美與愛的方式讓問題和困難迎刃而解。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S4
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces different kinds of dinosaurs as they explore their world with their friends! "幫幫龍出動"通過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

With a magic brush, Remy Bear can bring the friends in his drawings alive and they solve problems. 主人公熊小米和他的朋友主人公們的成長過程中總是遇到層出不窮、千奇百怪的問題和困難，他們在神奇畫筆的幫助下，通過極富想象力和創造力的涂鴉繪畫，迎難而上，集思廣益，用充滿美與愛的方式讓問題和困難迎刃而解。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S4
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces different kinds of dinosaurs as they explore their world with their friends! "幫幫龍出動"通過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 笨狼和他的小伙伴 Silly Wolf and His Buddies
programme.desc: In a distant and beautiful forest town, the animals live in harmony. However, amongst them, Silly Wolf is accident prone and gets into a lot of trouble despite good intentions... 在一個遙遠而美麗的森林小鎮，動物們和諧地生活。 但是，其中有小笨狼容易出事，儘管他的意圖是好的，但仍會造成很多麻煩，有時甚至會對他人造成傷害。 幸運的是，在朋友的幫助和陪伴下，小笨狼得以學習和成長，最終對他周圍的人產生了積極的影響。.(n)

programme.title: 奔奔小飛車 Egg Car
programme.desc: Meet Dash, an imperfect egg-shaped car and his friends – the mysterious Aera, the hedgehog Click, and the giraffe Girara! Together, they must rescue their village and families. 一同來和奔奔，一輛不完美的蛋形車和他的朋友 - 神秘的小愛，刺猬點點和長頸鹿高拉拉做朋友！ 四個年輕的小伙子必須一起從龍霸天，一個強大的反派和他的同黨手中拯救他們的村莊和家人！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S3
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S1
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 乐比悠悠 Rubi - The Arrival of Little Bro
programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 昆塔.叽里咕嚕奶泡泡 Secret Y2
programme.desc: Join our curious friends as they continue to introduce scientific knowledge to children by explaining things in a humorous way in this new season! Got a question? Gaga will answer! 歡迎加入我們好奇寶寶的一群！在新的一季，我們繼續通過有趣的方式介紹科學知識，GaGa和朋友會為你一一解答您的惑問！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 咘隆家族 Vroomiz S3
programme.desc: Enter the crazy world of VROOMIZ and join the adventures of our half-car, half-animal friends with Speeder, a little cheetah, leading the pack! 在可爱的动物汽车族群VROOMIZ生活的地方Grand Prix(GP)竞技比赛场每天都发生大大小小的难题和趣事，他们以富有创意的点子和团队合作精神，干净利落解决所有困难和问题。.(n)

programme.title: 乐比悠悠 Rubi - The Arrival of Little Bro
programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S2
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S1
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 咘隆家族 Vroomiz S3
programme.desc: Enter the crazy world of VROOMIZ and join the adventures of our half-car, half-animal friends with Speeder, a little cheetah, leading the pack! 在可爱的动物汽车族群VROOMIZ生活的地方Grand Prix(GP)竞技比赛场每天都发生大大小小的难题和趣事，他们以富有创意的点子和团队合作精神，干净利落解决所有困难和问题。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米小画家 Draw with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Draw with Miao Mi” teaches children Mandarin through drawing in a simple but fun way! 跟妙米一齐学习画画，发挥想象力，做个小画家！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S3
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces various kinds of dinosaurs through dinosaur exploration and help kids to develop healthy personalities by helping others. "幫幫龍出動"透過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S2
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S1
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 咘隆家族 Vroomiz S3
programme.desc: Enter the crazy world of VROOMIZ and join the adventures of our half-car, half-animal friends with Speeder, a little cheetah, leading the pack! 在可爱的动物汽车族群VROOMIZ生活的地方Grand Prix(GP)竞技比赛场每天都发生大大小小的难题和趣事，他们以富有创意的点子和团队合作精神，干净利落解决所有困难和问题。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米小画家 Draw with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Draw with Miao Mi” teaches children Mandarin through drawing in a simple but fun way! 跟妙米一齐学习画画，发挥想象力，做个小画家！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S3
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces various kinds of dinosaurs through dinosaur exploration and help kids to develop healthy personalities by helping others. "幫幫龍出動"透過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S2
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S1
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 咘隆家族 Vroomiz S3
programme.desc: Enter the crazy world of VROOMIZ and join the adventures of our half-car, half-animal friends with Speeder, a little cheetah, leading the pack! 在可爱的动物汽车族群VROOMIZ生活的地方Grand Prix(GP)竞技比赛场每天都发生大大小小的难题和趣事，他们以富有创意的点子和团队合作精神，干净利落解决所有困难和问题。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米小画家 Draw with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Draw with Miao Mi” teaches children Mandarin through drawing in a simple but fun way! 跟妙米一齐学习画画，发挥想象力，做个小画家！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S3
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces various kinds of dinosaurs through dinosaur exploration and help kids to develop healthy personalities by helping others. "幫幫龍出動"透過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S2
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S1
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 咘隆家族 Vroomiz S3
programme.desc: Enter the crazy world of VROOMIZ and join the adventures of our half-car, half-animal friends with Speeder, a little cheetah, leading the pack! 在可爱的动物汽车族群VROOMIZ生活的地方Grand Prix(GP)竞技比赛场每天都发生大大小小的难题和趣事，他们以富有创意的点子和团队合作精神，干净利落解决所有困难和问题。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米小画家 Draw with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Draw with Miao Mi” teaches children Mandarin through drawing in a simple but fun way! 跟妙米一齐学习画画，发挥想象力，做个小画家！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S3
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces various kinds of dinosaurs through dinosaur exploration and help kids to develop healthy personalities by helping others. "幫幫龍出動"透過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)

programme.desc: This series shows how Rubi accepts Le Le as her younger brother, handles the conflicts and rivalry and starts to get along well with him by describing their daily life. 《樂比悠悠之樂樂來了》主打二胎概念，樂比本屬於家中獨寵，當家中有了新成員—弟弟樂樂之後，每一天都和以前不一樣了。本片寓教於樂，描述了樂比和弟弟樂樂的日常生活，從抗拒、衝突到一起玩玩鬧鬧，度過溫暖時光。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 嘟哒和达达 Duda & Dada S2
programme.desc: Duda & Dada meet new friends in season 2! This time, the duo, along with Chikoo the Panda and the shy boy Webber, search for a hidden treasure deep inside the “Unknown Forest”. 小鼹鼠嘟哒和小女孩达达在神秘森林尋找寶藏，途中結識了三位新朋友加入他們的旅程。這些可愛的森林小伙伴會否找到被埋藏深處的寶藏呢？.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 勇敢的消防车雷恩 Fire Engine, Ray
programme.desc: Ray, a talking fire engine, and his friends pay close attention to the daily surroundings to remove any obstacles and dangers lying in children’s way set out by troublemakers. 会说话的消防车雷恩和队员时刻保持警觉，确保实时清除孩子们必经之路上的障碍与危险，和注意三个喜欢制造麻烦的坏蛋造成的事故。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 戈布和朋友们 Gob & Friends
programme.desc: In this odd and funny animated series full of slapstick comedy, Gob, the buffalo, and his awesome friends explore a fantasy world of fable seeded with Indonesian culture! 住在印尼的戈布和朋友们时常一起嬉戏、开玩笑，他们趣怪的表情和举止必会令你捧腹大笑。.(n)

programme.title: 西游记的故事 Tales from Journey to the West S2
programme.desc: Tales From Journey To The West is a charming and engaging animated series that tells the fantasy story of the world-famous Monkey King! 西遊記的故事以生動有趣的動畫，將耳熟能詳的中國小說經典介紹給小朋友。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米写字班 Write with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Write With Miao Mi” is an interactive animation series that teaches children how to write basic simplified Chinese characters in a fun and creative way! 《妙米写字班》让你透过简单而有趣的动画轻轻松松学会写汉字。.(n)

programme.title: 探探猫之奇幻马戏团 Fantastic Circus of Detective Meow S1
programme.desc: Detective Meow and his friends have setup their own detective agency. After resolving a series of mysterious cases, they became the no. 1 enemy of Dr. Turtle. 探探猫、小飞红、豆豆猪依旧在马戏团的打杂界中活跃着，他们成立的妙妙侦探社，解决了一系列悬疑惊险的事件后，探探猫现在已稳居乌龙博士的眼中钉排行榜第一位了。.(n)

programme.title: 咘隆家族 Vroomiz S3
programme.desc: Enter the crazy world of VROOMIZ and join the adventures of our half-car, half-animal friends with Speeder, a little cheetah, leading the pack! 在可爱的动物汽车族群VROOMIZ生活的地方Grand Prix(GP)竞技比赛场每天都发生大大小小的难题和趣事，他们以富有创意的点子和团队合作精神，干净利落解决所有困难和问题。.(n)

programme.title: 妙米小画家 Draw with Miao Mi
programme.desc: “Draw with Miao Mi” teaches children Mandarin through drawing in a simple but fun way! 跟妙米一齐学习画画，发挥想象力，做个小画家！.(n)

programme.title: 妙米学堂 Miao Mi Classroom
programme.desc: "Miao Mi Classroom" introduces Mandarin to children through stimulating flash cards and animation presented in a fun and interactive way. 《妙米教室》让你透过启发性的认字卡和动画，轻轻松松学会听、说及读汉语。.(n)

programme.title: 帮帮龙出动 GO GO Dino S3
programme.desc: Go Go Dino introduces various kinds of dinosaurs through dinosaur exploration and help kids to develop healthy personalities by helping others. "幫幫龍出動"透過探索來介紹不用種類的恐龍，幫助孩子通過幫助他人來培養健康的性情。.(n)
